title: It’s Been A Month Since This Bert Show Member Has Been On Medication
description:
For well over a month now Romeo has been seeing a therapist and taking Prozac to manage his anxiety and he says that his only regret is not going sooner.
He’s dealt with his parent’s negative views on therapy and medication for so long and those views and opinions played a huge part in his delayed decision to go—and for that reason alone, Romeo still has not told his parents.
The Bert Show is extremely proud of Romeo’s growth. Every day we see the result of the self-work Romeo has done to become a better person and for that, we congratulate him for his courage and resilience and for taking control of his life
